name: VR Flappy for Google Cardboard
description:
A VR version of the classic bird jumping game in first person 3D virtual reality for Google Cardboard VR.
Press the Cardboard trigger to jump!

Compare your high score with your friends, see who is the ultimate virtual reality flappy bird player! Gamepads supported!

COMPATIBLE VR ( Virtual Reality) HEADSETS
Google Cardboard VR
Stooksy
Merge VR
Durovis Dive VR
Refugio 3D
VRTX One
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
Nibiru
View-Master
